directions: Stir together cucumber, tomatoes, herbs, green onions and lemon juice. Let sit for a half-hour to an hour before serving. Supposed to be served with bread.
ingredients: 1 cup grape or cherry tomatoes, quartered or halved
2/3 cup fresh parsley and/or mint, chopped
1 tbsp fresh lemon juice (half a lemon)
title: Cucumber Tomato Salad
